messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. How many densely-connected scholar clusters do we have in this group? A densely-connected cluster is a group of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars.

Let's think through this step by step:
1. We have a group of 21 scholars with connections between some of them
2. A densely-connected cluster requires a minimum of 2 scholars connected to each other within the cluster
3. Amir is connected to 6 scholars (Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, Reza) - this forms a cluster
4. Sara is connected to 6 scholars (Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, Puja) - this forms another cluster 
5. Zack is connected to 6 scholars (Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, Prem) - this forms a third cluster
6. Nisha is connected to 5 scholars (Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei) who are all connected to each other - this forms a fourth cluster
7. Raj is connected to 4 scholars (Jing, Wei, Reza, Wim) who are all connected to each other - this is part of the fourth cluster
8. Pam is connected to 5 scholars (Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, Puja) - this forms a fifth cluster
9. Moin is connected to 4 scholars (Puja, Pari, Kim, Ian) - this is part of the fifth cluster
10. Ming is connected to 5 scholars (Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia) - this is part of the third cluster
11. Wei is connected to 3 scholars (Reza, Wim, Eva) - this connects the first and third clusters 
12. Kim is connected to 3 scholars (Ian, Puja, Pari) - this is part of the fifth cluster
13. Ian is connected to 2 scholars (Puja, Pari) - this is part of the fifth cluster
14. Gia is connected to 4 scholars (Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy) - this is part of the third cluster
15. Reza is connected to 2 scholars (Wim, Jing) - this connects the first and fourth clusters
16. Puja is connected to 1 scholar (Pari) - this is part of the fifth cluster
17. Prem is connected to 3 scholars (Matt, Eva, Amy) - this is part of the third cluster
18. Wim is connected to 1 scholar (Jing) - this connects the first and fourth clusters
19. Pari is connected to 1 scholar (Amy
